column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Robyn - Thank you for your great review. I'm glad you enjoyed our ramen
column2: and we appreciate your great photos. We flash boil our bok choy and then place it in an ice bath to keep its integrity. We understand that's not how everyone enjoys this topping
column3: but this is how we are instructed to cook and serve this item. Nevertheless
column4: we thank you for your kind words
column5: and we hope you'll visit us again soon.
